item.title: Trump calls Putin 'crazy' after largest Russian attack on Ukraine
item.description: In a rare rebuke, the US president says he is "not happy" with his Russian counterpart over the latest attacks.

item.title: North Korea arrests senior official over warship launch failure
item.description: The Workers' Party official was "largely responsible" for the botched launch, state media said.

item.title: Thousands remember George Floyd on fifth anniversary of death
item.description: As the cities where Floyd grew up and died hold commemorations, the US "reckoning" with racism seems to be fading.

item.title: King travels to support Canada as it fends off Trump
item.description: The King and Queen will be arriving in Canada on Monday for a visit seen as a symbol of support.

item.title: Why King Charles III's trip to Canada is more than just a royal visit
item.description: BBC royal correspondent Daniela Relph on King Charles III's trip to Canada where he will open the countryâ€™s parliament.
